prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a ninja with unique blue patterns.
Show me a Pokemon with stealthy features and a striking blue color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings with a sleek design.
Design a Pokemon with agile movements and a fun, playful personality.
Give me a Pokemon that has both water and dark traits in its appearance.
Generate a creature that thrives in aquatic environments and loves to battle.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its speed and cunning tactics in fights.
